data.message:
Hello :)
I would like to ask you for help about official facebook page verification. Can you explane me how to get to the verification,and can I even verificate page of 30.000 followers ?

I hope that you will answer.
Hello from Serbia

replies.message: Hi Edin. You can learn more about the process for verifying Pages here: http://bit.ly/2qrBmJS. Please keep in mind that not all Pages are currently eligible for verification. -Neha

Facebook Thank you for your help. But, unfortunately, for the region Serbia this option is not enabled.
Is this decision current or permanent? Can you change it? I really care to verify the site. Is there another way to come up to the mark verification or is this the only way?
Greetings!

Facebook Thank you for your help. But, unfortunately, for the region Serbia this option is not enabled.
Is this decision current or permanent? Can you change it? I really care to verify the site. Is there another way to come up to the mark verification or is this the only way?
Greetings!
